metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42004 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: In FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.13.4, resource exhaustion can occurbecause of a lack of a check in BeanDeserializer._deserializeFromArray toprevent use of deeply nested arrays. An application is vulnerable only withcertain customized choices for deserialization.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
